pages.text: Just Enough Items (JEI) is a powerful utility mod that helps you discover items and recipes across all your installed mods. $(br2)Learn how to search, find crafting recipes, and explore the many features of this indispensable tool.

To find items in specific mods, use the '@' symbol followed by the mod name (e.g., '@create'). $(br2)Click on any item in the JEI sidebar to see its crafting recipe. $(br2)To discover what recipes an item is used for, press 'U' (by default) while hovering over it.

Add bookmarks for recipes by hovering over any item in the JEI sidebar and pressing 'A'. $(br2)This will add it to the bookmarks list on the left side of the screen, providing quick access to your favorite recipes and items.
